title: Implement Session Timeout with Activity Tracking
description: Add automatic session timeout that logs users out after a period of inactivity, with a warning dialog before timeout.
instructions:
Create an activity-based session timeout system that:

1. Tracks user activity (taps, scrolls, keyboard input)
2. Resets a timeout timer on any activity
3. Shows a warning dialog 1 minute before timeout
4. Allows users to extend their session from the warning dialog
5. Logs out automatically if no action is taken
6. Configurable timeout duration (default 15 minutes)

Create the following:
- ActivityTracker widget that wraps your app and tracks user interactions
- SessionTimeoutManager class to manage timeout logic
- TimeoutWarningDialog that appears before session expires
- Integration with the existing auth state management

hints.text: Use the Listener widget with onPointerDown to detect user activity without affecting the gesture system.
Calculate warning time as (timeoutDuration - warningDuration) and start both timers at once.
The warning dialog should show a live countdown - use a Timer.periodic to update the seconds remaining every second.
